channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Lightbox Gallery
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Lightbox Gallery

item.title: CVE-2022-4682|2024-08-03T01:48:39.936Z -- unknown -- lightbox%20gallery
item.description: The Lightbox Gallery WordPress plugin before 0.9.5 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks
